General.Name: Prima Andalan Mandiri Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Prima Andalan Mandiri Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates as a coal mining company in Indonesia. The company develops and operates a coal mining project that covers 9,240 hectares located in Sungai Krassi, Kecamatan Sesayap, and Sembakung of North Kalimanta. It also provides mining contractor and shipping services. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Prima Andalan Mandiri Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Edika Agung Mandiri.
